txt.en: Collect bribing gold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Knock on the door where Gothtal is holed up
Aran Greenwith can be found near Cotfast in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith near Cotfast.
Cotfast can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should enter Cotfast.
Destroyed Orc bounties ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat enemies in Cotfast ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'[placeholder], there seems to be something wrong at the Trestlebridge gate leading towards the Wildwood. The guards are at a loss for words. Come, let us approach the Trestlebridge gate ourselves and find out what situation transpires.'
Sound the Cotfast village alarm
Defeat Gothtal
The Woodcutter's Brotherhood has decided to drive off the Orc menace in the Wildwood, once and for all.
Much of Trestlebridge has been rebuilt! ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Aran Greenwith at Trestlebridge
Survey the reconstruction of Trestlebridge
Orc bounties and bribing gold can be found in Cotfast.\n\nYou should destroy the Orc bounties, collect the bribing gold, and defeat foes at Cotfast.
Talk to Aran Greenwith at Trestlebridge
Enter Cotfast
The building in which Gothtal is holed up can be found in Cotfast.\n\nYou should knock on the door and confront Gothtal.
Examined the situation ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy Orc bounties ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Aran Greenwith near Cotfast
'What's all this about?!'
'Where is everyone?!'
'Who sounded the alarm?!'
Talk to Aran Greenwith near Cotfast
'Don't cross me! I work for Sharkey! That's a name that should strike fear in you, filth!'
Collected bribing gold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Sharkey gave me the Wildwood! I'm not about to surrender it to the likes of you!'
Survey the reconstruction of Trestlebridge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You'll pay for what you've done here today!'
Unsurprisingly, no one answered the door
DNT
Defeated enemies in Cotfast ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I am surprised that Gothtal was so easily bested. Now we know he was only an intermediary for this Sharkey character, who seems to have interests in much of Bree-land and the surrounding regions. Sharkey can not be merely an Orc, with all the mischief attached to that name. No matter, these are not troubles for the Woodcutter's Brotherhood to dwell upon. We should continue to focus on Trestlebridge.\n\n'Another building has been restored in town, [placeholder]. Would you like to inspect the craftmanship?'
Reconstruction work continues on Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should survey the reconstruction of Trestlebridge.
The alarm rings out, and Gothtal appears
Defeated Gothtal
Aran Greenwith can be found at Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith.
The Cotfast village alarm can be found nearby.\n\nYou should sound the alarm to get Gothtal's attention.

'In the time since you have joined the Woodcutter's Brotherhood, we have accomplished much together. Trestlebridge is greatly restored, the Wildwood is safer, and the spirits of the townsfolk have been lifted. The Brotherhood has you to thank as a valued member both among our rank and of our community. I thank you, we all thank you, for your efforts here. You have made Trestlebridge the beacon it was meant to be.'
Examine the situation at the western gate of Trestlebridge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Aran Greenwith

'There are a number of foes who reside in Cotfast. We should make quick work of them and destroy anything we find that connects Gothtal to this village. The Orc is no doubt influencing those in the Wildwood with gold and other riches.\n\n'Once the town is clear, then we shall defeat Gothtal. For Trestlebridge!'
Much of Trestlebridge has been rebuilt!
'It is done. Gothtal's threat to the Wildwood and Trestlebridge is no more. Come, let us return to town.'
Aran Greenwith can be found at Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith.
Something was placed at the western gate of Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should examine the situation there.
Aran Greenwith can be found at Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith.
Confrontation at Cotfast

'This Gothtal has gone too far. He taunts us while we do nothing and he plots attacks. No more! I had given a task to woodcutters in the town's service to report any sightings of Gothtal directly to the Woodcutter's Brotherhood. I have received a very recent report that the Orc has returned to Cotfast. I say we march to Cotfast and confront Gothtal. His days of taunting Trestlebridge are over!'
Aran Greenwith can be found near Cotfast in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith near Cotfast.
